title: Eve Brenner: Zombie Agent
description: In the second installment of The Zombie Girl Saga, Eve teams up with CSIS to find out more about the Azrael Virus coursing through her veins. As she learns about the dangers of the virus, she also learns that there are some advantages to being less than human. Eve is quickly thrown into fieldwork to stop the spread of a virus that is spreading silently on a global level.She might be the only hope the world has, but sheâ€™s running out of time.
author: A. Giacomi
